numlitem.para: FMC is initialized with known total fuel quantity,
For non-PIP and non-Pegasus FMCs, both EICAS computers are operative,
For Pegasus FMCs with Operational Program Software part number 3418-HNP-02C-08 or earlier, Thrust Management System is operative.
Check performance INIT page; if fuel quantity is incorrect or blank, manually enter correct quantity.

placard.para: Placard Total Fuel Quantity Indication "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
